fundraise_bal.description: value of how much we have raised so far

fundraise_denom.description: Denom of token accepted to fundraise with

fundraise_goal.description: value of the goal we want to raise

fundraising_open.description: If fundraising is open to contributions or not

Decimal.description:
A fixed-point decimal value with 18 fractional digits, i.e. Decimal(1_000_000_000_000_000_000) == 1.0

The greatest possible value that can be represented is 340282366920938463463.374607431768211455 (which is (2^128 - 1) / 10^18)
